statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{14.03}; top has length \displaystyle{7.87}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{7.68} and \displaystyle{7.86}. The height is \displaystyle{7.13}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{7.87}+{7.86}+{14.03}+{7.68}={37.44}.
